Description.name: Description0
Description.content: For flushing, you can choose if you want to flush the cache for online resources and if you want to flush the whole cache (keys and variations), or only the stored variations of HTML output.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Core cache flushing, flushes always the whole cache. No options are available.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The image cache flushing tool allows to specify a date, such that only images (image variations) are removed that have not been requested after the given date.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The JSP repository can only be flushed completely. Afterward, all JSPs that are requested must be exported to the server again, before they are executed.
